name: Russian Hut Simulator
description:
This game is basically a classic walking simulator. All you have to do is to explore detailed recreated rooms of an old Russian hut and admire the beauty of its interior. The interior of the house is worked out to the smallest detail, so you can immerse yourself in the atmosphere of free village life, away from the gloomy high-rise buildings, the noise of cars and endless city bustle.

Game Features


  • Realistic graphics and meditative music
  • Choice of location and time of day
  • Atmosphere of village life
  • Endless replayability
